title: Everything I Shouldn't
description: He’s the one person she shouldn’t want But the only person she can’t live without. SarahBeth Pearson has always made the right decisions, walking the line. But when that line begins to blur, her path, her future, changes course. It was supposed to be a secret—a secret that was never to be leaked. But how can true love be kept quiet? It can’t. It couldn’t. It didn’t. And now she has to face the consequences.
author: Stacey Lewis
